website_summaries.verdict: The FuelCore Nitrel v2 is a neutral New Balance trail shoe that delivers the right combination of speed, traction, and style. Engineered to tackle challenging trail terrains and rough road surfaces, this shoe is liked by most runners for all the right reasons that it was made for. Although there are a few reviews about the shoe's accuracy with its sizing, same as its predecessor, the FuelCore Nitrel v2 is still recommended by most of its users.
pros: Many runners praised the shoe for the comfort it provided during their trail runs
The FuelCore Nitrel v2's responsive performance was also liked by the majority of both trail and road runners
Many high arched runners appreciated that the shoe provides just the right amount of support that they needed, especially in the heel area
Plenty of users liked that the shoe is very lightweight to train and run in
Most wearers of the FuelCore Nitrel v2 like that the shoes' outsole grip is versatile for running in both trail and road
A lot of positive responses from buyers were mentioned about the shoe coming in both standard and 4E sizes
The majority of the wearers find the shoes very efficient in providing a comfortable and roomy toe box
Some buyers liked the different colorway choices that the shoe comes in
cons: One commenter noted that he finds there is too much material in the heel collar, causing some discomfort
A few wearers also mentioned that the FuelCore Nitrel v2 upper material comes off as a bit stiff
Some purchasers did not like that the shoe was too tight for the fit that they wanted

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: First off, New Balance is pretty much the one shoe brand that actually fits people who have wide well. A lot of folks have complained recently that extra wide shoes are starting to feel like wide and wides feel like standard. And then when you find a wide shoes, it's BLACK. C'mon Nike and others, everybody doesn't have a narrow foot. And we deserve nice kicks too. These joints feel amazeballs. I purchased an extra wide and these awesome.
customer_reviews.author: L.Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shoe. I have slightly flat feet, and the low arch support and roomy toebox provide great comfort. I can walk in these shoes for longer than most others I have tried recently (12 other pairs) without discomfort. The shoes are light and seem a bit more rugged than most running shoes, although not sure how they would fair on actual trails. I use them mostly for walking on paved/grassy/dirt surfaces as well as a treadmill and they feel great. The soles feel grippy, although I have not tried them on wet surfaces yet. Overall for the price (< $25) this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: lamer0

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Stylish, & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pictures don’t do these shoes justice because they are awesome in person. The material is lightweight, flexible, and breathable, perfect for running. There are also mild arch supports that make these shoes comfortable enough for all day wear. I’ve had these shoes for several months now and they’re still as comfortable and supportive as they were the day I got them. I walk up to four miles daily and they definitely still look like new. I would definitely recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Wolf

customer_reviews.title: very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and having been running in New Balance 993 for many years, in the extra wide (size 4e); I ordered 4e for this model and they are incredibly narrow, despite being labeled 4e. FYI. Otherwise, they seem like nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D.Profedu

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking but cosmetic flaw
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look sharp!!! My son picked these out for the school year. Unfortunately, they’ve only been worn to school for 14 days, and the toes are already losing their color. Had I known they would wear so quickly cosmetically, we would have purchased something else. Other than that, we have no complaints. And he’ll continue wearing these!
customer_reviews.author: zphillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe for MTB Biking
customer_reviews.text: The low cut around the ankle gives me more flex ability when pedaling. Did some hiking & biking wearing them in lose dirt up some extreme hills and rocky terrain at Portuguese Bend Reserve today the soles gripped with out slipping extremely well. I will be purchasing a 2nd pair I like these so much.
customer_reviews.author: Seymor Skagneti

customer_reviews.title: Get a diff New Balance shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many pairs of New Balance and have always loved their products, but this shoe is just absolutely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jtipp

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and these fit as expected. I trail run and need a shoe with grip and light weight. This shoe is a bit heavy but has good flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Matas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a little more comfortable than the other New Balance pair I have. They look great also! Weight wise they are not too light or too heavy. Perfectly balanced!
customer_reviews.author: kentstoys1

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: To wide for my liking... Normally it will say WIDE...This did not and ofcourse they are wide
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are of great quality and fit. Extremely comfortable and great looking. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the worst shoes ever.... This was the very first day worn
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: good kicks
customer_reviews.text: digging them after several months of daily use now. i'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality and look sharp
customer_reviews.text: Got for a needy student at school. He loved them and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: RMP OhioXD

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these to walk, hike, bike ride, work, etc. They are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ryan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great wide size sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I find New balance to currently have the best selection of wide size shoes that fit comfortably. Nice style and easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe even better price!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price! Fit feels great and the tread is my favorite! These work great in the er! They were so affordable that I bought my son a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Simion

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at first as the price was so low however I wanted a good all around running shoe so I went ahead and bought them. These shoes are absolutely amazing! I was having a bit of runners knee pain and switching to these has taken it away. I go between trails and street running and these are great for both... very supportive in the woods yet light and springy on the streets. I will be purchasing theae again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: BLyons

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe and good for old guys
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for old guys with old toes that do not work properly. The shoe has a wide boxy toe area and is kind of stretchy in that area. The weight is the shoe is much lighter than I expected, overall very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe in my sons size and he was unable to wear these shoes. They run very narrow and are very uncomfortable. They are also not very attractive shoes. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've worn New Balance for 20 plus years. This is the worst shoe I've ever gotten. Shoe was uncomfortable. fit was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: FInally, an x-wide shoe that isn't all black
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find x-wide (4E) shoes with a bit of color to them; most are all-black, all-white or some other boring color. I like that these came in others hues with a little pizzazz and style. Also, they fit great and are comfortable, both hallmarks of the New Balance brand.
customer_reviews.author: AMHepworth

customer_reviews.title: Decent every day sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at a local sneaker store, then found them on Amazon for half the price!!!- exchanged them immediately. For the Amazon price, these are great. I've worn them everyday for a month. There is already some wear where my shoes rub together when I walk, which is disappointing. Growing up running, my sneakers would last at least an entire year... but for the price, these are good! They took away some of my knee pain from walking around with shoes that lack support.
customer_reviews.author: Rube

customer_reviews.title: Not quite enough ankle support
customer_reviews.text: This shoes has a great tread but not enough low ankle support and stability to give me confidence to use for aggressive trail let alone road running. I returned these before use because I felt like I would constantly be worried about rolling my ankle even with a misstep on flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M

customer_reviews.title: Too small and terrible traction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 4e (extra wide) for my feet, which are normally 2e, and these shoes still feel tight around the middle of the feet. Also, while these are sold as "all-terrain" shoes, the outsoles are ridiculously slippery. It's been raining pretty hard the last few days. I wore these out (just out shopping, on pavement), and it was like walking on ice skates. Be careful if you're using these on wet pavement or tile. They do not stick to the ground the way real all-terrain shoes should. I paid $30 for the pair, and I'm having a hard time seeing how the shoes are even worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: They were OK
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and light weight, but not as comfortable as other NB shoes I've owned. They were a little tight on the top part of my feet. They also seem to "tilt forward" with little padding at the mid/front of the shoes. I'm not a "runner" and that might be preferred by some runners...I use them at work and prefer a little more cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: s nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for trail running. First time I wore them was also the first time on a new trail. I ran uphill on a loop trail, and hadn't really scouted the downward side. On the way back down these shoes probably save me from a broken leg! I must have been running at 25MPH down a slippery wet trail. The grip on these was phenomenal and the fit on the wide was perfect for my flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually taken these on a trail run yet so I can't speak to their intended performance but wearing them as an everyday shoe while I break them in they are surprisingly comfortable. I have an average width foot and an average arch but always seem to need a little extra room in the toe box which this provides. Not too spacious, not too snug. My only concern is that the neoprene part of the shoe will not stand up to much abuse. I'm also curious as to how the traction will do on an actual trail. It doesn't seem much more rugged than a road shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Van Gilst

customer_reviews.title: Sole is started to come appart after a month
customer_reviews.text: I hardly put the sneakers on, and the sole started to come lose. I tried cement but it only lasted 2-3 days. I would not recommend these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Pol

customer_reviews.title: Fits my bunionette feet
customer_reviews.text: My feet are pretty damn wide, just over 4.5 inches at the widest point, thanks to the bunionettes. So a 4E (EEEE) shoe is required. This came and look great and FITS GREAT! I wear a size 13 and this is spot on. Feet finally feel good. Good quality shoe for walking, running, etc. I'm no sports all star, but I do like taking walks and going on trails and these are very comfortable. Breathable, comfy, sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DmanGTR

customer_reviews.title: Hit the trail
customer_reviews.text: Wow these shoes are comfortable. I can't wait to hit the trails to see how they perform there, but for wearing around town they are light, comfortable, and fashionable. The shoe runs true to size
customer_reviews.author: Jon Snow

customer_reviews.title: A good pair of real New Balance.
customer_reviews.text: These fit the way I expect a New balance to fit. I have square wide feet and New Balance is really the only shoe that fits well. This style fits great for me. The price was great, and it is very comfortable. I use it for my gym shoes right now. I have tried some other styles and this one is the clear winner so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fabric on middle part of shoe cuts apart quickly. For running not for fashion
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked great when I got them but they lack durability in the middle portion. After wearing them 3 times, the fabric by my inside ankle (but outside of shoe) rubbed together and cut each other on both shoes. Now the fabric is kind of fuzzy. They function fine as running shoes but I can't wear them out fashionably with the fuzziness which has gotten worse.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Aric

customer_reviews.title: Runs half a size small
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks good and was at a good price. However, shoe does run a half size smaller. I think I can manage with thin socks so I'll keep it. The other two NB at the same size 7.5 4E ran at least a size smaller. Yea, that bad.
customer_reviews.author: The0ne

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars is not enough!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have awful feet. Bone spurs, bunions etc. I was told to buy an expensive sandal and shoe insert. For the first time in a long time, I don’t need the inserts. These shoes are perfect! Best shoes I have worn in several year. I wish they cane in white. If I could give them 10 stars, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Мартин

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit like V1
customer_reviews.text: The V1 model was a great fit for me and a very comfortable shoe but it did not last long due to not having the rubber tread. I was hoping this was a more durbe version of the V1, it is not. Felt like a cheaper knock off shoe on the upper fit and lacking support from the sole. Returned, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: friendly

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this is the only New Balance shoe I have ever purchased that doesn't fit well and is totally uncomfortable from day #1. I love the style and the color but I can't wear them due to how uncomfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: hithere28

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I wear them daily, as they have become my go-to shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jody L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I bought them to play softball in to replace my turf shoes but I find myself wearing them out and about because the are so comfortable. I might end up buying another pair for casual use. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes for price. Writing this review after wearing the shoe for a few months. Wore them strictly for working out. Inside on the heel wore out. Other than that fit well. With enough space for my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Karlton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore them on vacation after wearing for a couple days at office. Feel light but supportive. I have a lot of heel issues and these really feel nice on my feel. Only issue would be the tongue of the shoe pushes on the top of my foot because there is an elastic attached to tongue. That can get annoying after a while, but otherwise very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: digitalagent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable shoes. However, I have always chosen New Balance in the past for their commitment to American Manufacturing. I was disappointed to see these are not made in the USA. Not a deal breaker, just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure if it's a fake.
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the shoes picked up a "creek" noise to it after 2 months. Bought nothing but NB for the last 10 years, none of them ever developed a walking noise in them, even beyond the extended extreme use.
customer_reviews.author: RAMairGTO72

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Rules
customer_reviews.text: When you’re a size 11 4E, you don’t get a lot of shoe options. New Balance addressed this problem and I’ve worn them as far as I can remember. The upside, they make some beautiful affordable shoes. I have a pair that’s 12 years old and they are still in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy!! You’re not getting these beautiful green shoes on this picture
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoes but they shouldn’t have green shoes on this picture when they’re actually gray, it was my fault for not reading but they should put the right picture on
customer_reviews.author: The Punisher

customer_reviews.title: 4E in this shoe is not as wide as 2E in previous New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are wearable but somewhat tight. 4E is not as wide as 2E in previous NB trail running shoes such as 910 V3 and 510. Also support around heel is not as good and it feels like your feet can pull out of the shoe at the heel. Big step backwards from previous products.
customer_reviews.author: Mtneer_076

customer_reviews.title: Firm AND cushiony?! BOOM!
customer_reviews.text: A great diverse shoe for training in all conditions. Runs great on trail and pavement. A really firm shoe, but surprisingly cushiony. Durable sole seems to be holding up to mixed use wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect. The sneakers are very comfortable and cushy. I have super wide feet and ASICS makes a really good wide sneaker. Glad I good find some colors other than black and white.
customer_reviews.author: BuzBoy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these New Balance shoes. My feet are wide and these fit perfect. Very comfortable. I can even play golf in them because of the All terrain tread.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe with support no stress on the feet just what you would expect from New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Too large of a shoe. Won’t allow returns.
customer_reviews.text: Product was not the color displayed in the photo. Also, the shoes are like wearing boats on your feet. They are gigantic. Nearly impossible to run in. Went to return and they will not take them back. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: chevy

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit really well, with no internal abrasive seams to cause uncomfortable rubbing, and are the best looking New Balance shoes I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: William S. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not only great looking, with cool colors, but is really comfortable. Can't ever go wrong with this New Balance shoes!
customer_reviews.author: gatorjag

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them. True to size. They are more of a light grey than the brownish grey mud color I was hoping it would be. Still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Y. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fitting shoes good for trail and pavement at a great price. Got an extra pair for the running while on travel. Only negative is the shoes could use a little more arch support. Hence the 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and cool shoe
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff but wore them today and we're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Megan curry

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Feels good but material falls apart fast at pinch points within a month with mild use
customer_reviews.author: benjamin turfmann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11.5 with nike but new balance always see to run big so i ordered a 11 and it's a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Trent Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe box relative to other NB runners
customer_reviews.text: Narrow toe box. The tread works in dirt. Snow is pretty sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Built well.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for running on the road and on the trail. They provide good support and can go the distance.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes as a gift. New balance is amazing quality. Great design and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee Opitz

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Supportive, breathable, fit right, extremely comfortable, and good looking... Tempe to stock up like 10 pair!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Okay shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a pretty good shoe but wasn't too comfortable for a long day at universal studios amusement park.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the money. The fit is perfect. I was surprised how much better quality they where than the ASICS I bought for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan j.

customer_reviews.title: Badass shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the neon color at the bottom of the shoe, looks great feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable pair of shoes I have!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of shoes. Get these with neon yellow shoe laces and your set
customer_reviews.author: Danburkhart50

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart after four months of light use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in January 2020... Two flat miles per day and the both heels are split open. Quality is non-existent. Avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, exactly as posted on website. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tennis shoes. very presentable. Not ghetto at all.
customer_reviews.author: RAMIRO HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome! They fit great and look better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Henkaline

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and very comfortable. Using it for my next spartan beast run.
customer_reviews.author: alexander arutynov

customer_reviews.title: New Balance
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were $125 at our local New Balance store. The fit is awesome, and wore everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gioiella

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome new pair of shoes, very cheap compared to the actual new balance website
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Shoes are very light yet traction on trail or trac are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for $17!!! That's hard to beat, when these shoes are originally around 80 bucks. These shoes are tough - I use them for intramurals, going to class, running, etc. I highly recommend, especially if you get as great a price as I did!
customer_reviews.author: Max Oesterling

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet a lot for work. Was looking for a shoe that is supportive and durable, but at the same time lightweight. This shoe fit my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, stable and looks amazing. Strange person complimented 1st time out.
customer_reviews.author: elocutionx

customer_reviews.title: New Balance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe for my work. Great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for any kind of activity. I use them for hiking, running, and any other activity and have no issues at all. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Not quite as comfortable as my last pair of New Balance but still breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: John Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sneaker at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sneakers! Insanely comfortable! Love the styling of them. Plenty of compliments on the sneaker. Would buy again in a heartbeat! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Williamson

customer_reviews.title: 2E was unavailable . 4E seemed slightly smaller than I had expected so that worked out good for me
customer_reviews.text: Winter workout that I can use with multiple layers of socks
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Futterman

customer_reviews.title: they are nice and all but looks bigger on the photo.
customer_reviews.text: recomend buy 0.5 more bigger than ur exact fit feet
customer_reviews.author: Hercules.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe, stays tight on the foot all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and great fit
customer_reviews.text: On my feet 10 hours a day. Breathable, light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, i jog 2-5 miles daily and they have helped keep my legs and feet from hurting so much
customer_reviews.author: Bryan murray

customer_reviews.title: All-Terrain Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for all-terrain uses. Purchased specifically for disc golf courses.
customer_reviews.author: kingmatthew110

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes but alas, the toe box in all three sizes was just too narrow. The price was right as was the color and style but the toe box was a killer. I’ve been wearing NB for many years too but lately I’ve been having some diffficulty in finding NB’s that are reasonably priced and that fit and wear well. Every time I find a pair that works, I buy them until they no longer make them. That cycle seems to last about three years, then that shoe just disappears. Disappointing and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Niblock

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for gym not so much ats
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a pair of these here locally and found that my shoe size 13xw turned out to fit a little bigger than usual but thats ok. Shoe is overall comfortable ut id recommend if you usually wear a certain size try a half size smaller. Me myself i have fery wide flat feet and these are exceptionally comfortable but like i said it ran a little big.
customer_reviews.author: zantha

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide in red and black!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my xwide NB in red and black. They look terrific. Very comfortable fit, as they are true to size. I have worn 11 extra wide for years and these are just that, 11 xwide. I don’t understand some of the complaints, these are really nice shoes and they feel and look like quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, lightweight, a ton of compliments
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are everything I expected. If they run small AT ALL it might be a touch. I would get either get your size or at the most a half size up from what you need. I got my size and they did fit correctly, but barely, there is no extra room, so next time I might go a half size up. That being said, I am very happy with the shoes themselves. They look great, they are light, and this is one of very few shoes in wide widths that actually have some style. I would recommend for sure !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Reinsma

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trail shoe. Feels solid and well made. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C. Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes for 2 years, they have seen ocean water and countless trails and everyday use. These are the most comfortable new balance shoes I have ever had, the only con would be that the shoe laces suck but that's it. You just have to get used to the looser ankle. The red ones look amazing in person
customer_reviews.author: Jose V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of New Balance shoes and these are probably the most comfortable pair I've had in recent memory. I wear a 10.5 wide and there fit my foot perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Will Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best wide foot trail shoes at their price point. Look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Nitrel V2 FuelCore Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The New Balance fuelcore Nitrelv2 for men offers aggressive trail technology in a lightweight-yet-sturdy silhouette featuring an at tread hybrid outsole that's designed for trail and road use.
